mapper.select: SELECT SS_SEQ AS ssSeq, SS_OMNUM AS ssOmNum, SS_OSSERIAL AS ssOsSerial, SS_SCPCODE AS ssScpCode, SS_BCPCODE AS ssBcpCode, SS_MBID AS ssMbId, SS_CARDMONEY AS ssCardMoney, SS_COUPONMONEY AS ssCouponMoney, SS_LATERMONEY AS ssLaterMoney, SS_BUDGETMONEY AS ssBudgetMoney, SS_SAVEMONEY AS ssSaveMoney, SS_POINTMONEY AS ssPointMoney, SS_VIRTUALACCOUNTMONEY AS ssVirtualAccountMoney, SS_ORIGINALMONEY AS ssOriginalMoney, SS_SALEMONEY AS ssSaleMoney, SS_TOTORIGINALMONEY AS ssTotOriginalMoney, SS_TOTSALEMONEY AS ssTotSaleMoney, SS_CCNUMB AS ssCcNumB, SS_CCNUMS AS ssCcNumS, SS_CALCULATEBUSE AS ssCalculateBUse, SS_CALCULATESUSE AS ssCalculateSUse, SS_TYPE AS ssType, SS_MOID AS ssMoId, SS_INID AS ssInId, SS_MODATE AS ssMoDate, SS_INDATE AS ssInDate, SS_ACCOUNTMONEY AS ssAccountMoney, SS_MONEYUNIT AS ssMoneyUnit, SS_TX_SEQ AS ssTxSeq, SS_DPCODE AS ssDpCode, SS_KAKAOMONEY AS ssKakaoMoney, SS_PHONEMONEY AS ssPhoneMoney, SS_DUZONDATE AS ssDuzonDate, SS_DUZONFLAG AS ssDuzonFlag, SS_PAYPALMONEY AS ssPaypalMoney FROM sales WHERE ss_omnum = #{sales.ssOmNum}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SALES ( SS_SEQ, SS_OMNUM, SS_OSSERIAL, SS_SCPCODE, SS_BCPCODE, SS_MBID, SS_CARDMONEY, SS_COUPONMONEY, SS_LATERMONEY, SS_BUDGETMONEY, SS_SAVEMONEY, SS_POINTMONEY, SS_VIRTUALACCOUNTMONEY, SS_ORIGINALMONEY, SS_SALEMONEY, SS_TOTORIGINALMONEY, SS_TOTSALEMONEY, SS_CCNUMB, SS_CCNUMS, SS_CALCULATEBUSE, SS_CALCULATESUSE, SS_TYPE, SS_MOID, SS_INID, SS_MODATE, SS_INDATE, SS_ACCOUNTMONEY, SS_MONEYUNIT, SS_TX_SEQ, SS_DPCODE, SS_KAKAOMONEY, SS_PHONEMONEY, SS_DUZONDATE, SS_DUZONFLAG, SS_PAYPALMONEY ) VALUES ( USQ_SALES.NEXTVAL, #{sales.ssOmNum}, #{sales.ssOsSerial}, #{sales.ssScpCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sales.ssBcpCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sales.ssMbId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sales.ssCardMoney}, #{sales.ssCouponMoney}, #{sales.ssLaterMoney}, #{sales.ssBudgetMoney}, #{sales.ssSaveMoney}, #{sales.ssPointMoney}, #{sales.ssVirtualAccountMoney}, #{sales.ssOriginalMoney}, #{sales.ssSaleMoney}, #{sales.ssTotOriginalMoney}, #{sales.ssTotSaleMoney}, #{sales.ssCcNumB, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sales.ssCcNumS, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sales.ssCalculateBUse, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sales.ssCalculateSUse, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sales.ssType, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sales.ssMoId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sales.ssInId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sales.ssMoDate}, #{sales.ssInDate}, #{sales.ssAccountMoney}, #{sales.ssMoneyUnit}, #{sales.ssTxSeq}, #{sales.ssDpCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sales.ssKakaoMoney}, #{sales.ssPhoneMoney}, #{sales.ssDuzonDate, jdbcType=DATE}, #{sales.ssDuzonFlag, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sales.ssPaypalMoney} )
